CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: fragmentation
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The high-explosive charge detonates after a specific amount of time after landing, scattering lethal shell fragments in a large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: white phosphorus
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with white phosphorus. The chemical is dispersed on impact, increasing the temperature and covering the area and pawns in flames.
